i like antiques.

i enjoy reading and cooking.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes forget to take care of myself because I am too busy.
i am a nurse.
I enjoy spending my time with my two beagles, Chance and Boomer
my shyness made me panick and i did not show up.
I don't have a car, but my family and I love to drink Coke together.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy spending time with my family and my two beagles, Chance and Boomer.
That's cool, I love animals too. What's your favorite thing about your dogs?
I like their funny personalities and how cute they are.
Do you have a favorite hobby?
Those are both great hobbies. I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read historical fiction and mystery novels.
I have read some good historical fiction books lately. I'm a big fan of the Outlander series.
I've heard good things about that series. I'll have to check it out.
You should. It's a great read. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes.
Yum, me too. I'm a sucker for a good lasagna.
I love making lasagna too. It's so easy and delicious.
It's definitely a crowd pleaser. I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too. It's always nice to meet someone who enjoys the same things you do.
I agree. It's been great talking to you.
You too. Have a nice day.
